summary: Provides a helper that builds a three‑qubit NCT (NOT‑CNOT‑Toffoli) template labeled 5a_1, constructing the specific sequence of CNOT and X gates illustrated in the diagram using Qiskit’s QuantumCircuit.
business_intent: Offers a reusable circuit component for quantum algorithm developers and synthesis tools, allowing quick insertion of the 5a_1 NCT pattern into larger quantum programs.
